name: Pediatric Primary Tumor
title: Pediatric Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note:** Use the following resources to determine if a tumor is localized, regional, or distant (further contiguous extension).
* EOD: Review the primary site-based schema
* Summary Stage: Review the primary site-based chapter
rows:
Any size tumor
* Confined to site of origin
* Localized, NOS

Any size tumor
* Adjacent (connective) tissue, NOS
* Adjacent organ(s)/structure(s), NOS
* Regional, NOS

Any size tumor
* Further contiguous extension

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in medical record

Death Certificate Only
